cz.muni.fi.pb138.cv.service

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockedUserServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
    Service for user accounts.
    Author:
    Zuzana

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkIfExists(String login)
      Checks whether given login already exists in database.
      boolean registerNewUser(String login, String password)
      Registers new user with provided credentials.
      boolean verifyCredentials(String login, String password)
      Verifies provided user credentials.

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfExists

        boolean checkIfExists(String login)
        Checks whether given login already exists in database.
        Parameters:
        login - login to be checked
        Returns:
        true, if login exists, false otherwise

      • registerNewUser

        boolean registerNewUser(String login,
                        String password)
        Registers new user with provided credentials. First checks, if login is not already used.
        Parameters:
        login - login of new user
        passwordHash - hash of user's password
        Returns:
        true if process was successful, false otherwise

      • verifyCredentials

        boolean verifyCredentials(String login,
                          String password)
        Verifies provided user credentials.
        Parameters:
        login - login to look for
        passwordHash - hash of password associated with login
        Returns:
        true if login and passwordHash match any entry in database
